SA05rahppspu:rahpps_2_1: yas tvāṃ paśyati bhāvena sa paśyati tathāgatam //
SA05rahppspu:rahpps_3_0: tava cārye guṇāḍhyāyā buddhasya ca jagadguroḥ /
SA05rahppspu:rahpps_3_1: na paśyanty antaraṃ santaś candracandrikayor iva //
SA05rahppspu:rahpps_5_0: sakṛd apy āśaye śuddhe yas tvāṃ vidhivad īkṣate /
SA05rahppspu:rahpps_6_1: poṣikā janayitrī ca mātā tvam asi vatsalā //
SA05rahppspu:rahpps_7_0: yad buddhā lokaguravaḥ putrās tava kṛpālavaḥ /
SA05rahppspu:rahpps_9_0: vineyaṃ janam āsādya tatra tatra tathāgataiḥ /
SA05rahppspu:rahpps_10_1: tvāṃ prāpya pralayaṃ yānti doṣā vādāś ca vādinām //
SA05rahppspu:rahpps_12_0: yasya tvayy apy abhiṣvaṅgas tvannāthasya na vidyate /
SA05rahppspu:rahpps_13_0: nāgacchasi kutaś cit tvaṃ na ca kva cana gacchasi /
SA05rahppspu:rahpps_13_1: sthāneṣv api ca sarveṣu vidvadbhir nopalabhyase //
SA05rahppspu:rahpps_14_0: ye tvām evaṃ na paśyanti prapadyante ca bhāvataḥ /
SA05rahppspu:rahpps_14_1: prapadya ca vimucyante tad idaṃ mahad adbhutam //
SA05rahppspu:rahpps_15_0: tvām eva badhyate paśyann apaśyann api badhyate /
SA05rahppspu:rahpps_15_1: tvām eva mucyate paśyann apaśyann api mucyate //
SA05rahppspu:rahpps_16_1: sudurbodhāsi māyeva dṛśyase na ca dṛśyase //
SA05rahppspu:rahpps_17_0: buddhaiḥ pratyekabuddhaiś ca śrāvakaiś ca niṣevitā /
SA05rahppspu:rahpps_17_1: mārgas tvam ekā mokṣasya nāsty anya iti niścayaḥ //
SA05rahppspu:rahpps_18_1: kṛpayā lokanāthais tvam ucyase ca na cocyase //
SA05rahppspu:rahpps_19_0: śaktaḥ kas tvām iha stotuṃ nirnimittāṃ nirañjanām /
SA05rahppspu:rahpps_19_1: sarvavāgviśayātītāṃ yā tvaṃ kva cid aniśritā //
SA05rahppspu:rahpps_20_0: saty evam api saṃvṛtyā vākpathair vayam īdṛśaiḥ /
SA05rahppspu:rahpps_20_1: tvām astutyām api satīṃ tuṣṭūṣantaḥ sunirvṛtāḥ //
